import React from "react"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import HeaderImage from "../../assets/address-page-header.png"; import { Dropdown } from "semantic-ui-react"; import _ from "lodash"; import faker from "faker"; import "./address-page.styles.css"; import { countryOptions } from "./address-page.data"; const addressDefinitions = faker.definitions.address; const stateOptions = _.map(addressDefinitions.state, (state, index) => ({ key: addressDefinitions.state_abbr[index], text: state, value: addressDefinitions.state_abbr[index], })); const AdressPage = () => { const { register, handleSubmit } = useForm(); const onFormSubmit = (data) => console.log(data); const onErrors = (errors) => console.error(errors); return (

); }; export default AdressPage;
